title: BlackBerry, Tesla, Cassava Sciences, Paychex: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: BlackBerry’s sales fell from a year earlier; Tesla shares were outperforming other EV companies ahead of the open
body:
Stock futures were little changed after major Wall Street indexes snapped a three-day losing streak. Here’s what we’re watching in Wednesday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
